topbar.defaultTitle: Company Incorporation — Panama Private Interest Foundation

applicant.description: We’ll send documents, invoices, and status updates to the email below.

es.description: Panama has not implemented a general ES regime; ES applies mainly to certain special regimes (e.g., Multinational Headquarters SEM). In practice, General PIFs are not directly subject to ES requirements (tax/reporting obligations should be reviewed separately).※ Tax residence & activity in other countries may trigger taxation/CRS impacts — review case-by-case.

pep.title: J. Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
pep.label: A PEP is a current/former senior public official and their family/close associates. Here we only confirm whether any PIF participant is a PEP. Detailed checks are performed in the individual onboarding forms.

save.successDesc: Your application data has been saved.
save.errorDesc: Failed to save application. Please try again.

footer.copyright: © Mirr Asia · Panama PIF – Information & Intake Form

namingGuidelines.title: Naming Guidelines
namingGuidelines.body: The name must contain “Foundation” or “Fundación”. Identical or confusingly similar names cannot be registered. Please provide 1st/2nd/3rd choices; we will check availability.
namingGuidelines.smallNote: Please provide 1st/2nd/3rd choices; we will check availability.

endowmentInfo.title: Initial Endowment
endowmentInfo.body: Often recorded as “Initial Capital / Endowment”. Nominal minimum is USD 10,000 and there is no immediate funding obligation (it is recorded in the Charter as a commitment and can be funded/adjusted later).

options.mirr: Use Mirr Asia registered address (no extra charge)
options.own: I have my own registered address (provide below)

own.label: Separate Registered Address (English)
own.placeholder: Addressee / Contact / Address / Postal Code (English recommended)

purpose.label: Purpose of Establishment
purpose.placeholder: e.g., Asset protection, succession and charitable allocation, overseas shareholding and dividend management, etc.
purpose.helper: Combine the keywords or write freely.

Asset Protection.label: Asset Protection
Asset Protection.text: Hold real estate, financial assets, equities, and digital assets; establish asset protection via a foundation

Succession Planning.label: Succession Planning
Succession Planning.text: Hold and operate assets through the foundation and plan intergenerational succession

Charitable Purposes.label: Charitable Purposes
Charitable Purposes.text: Operate funds for charitable or religious purposes

Family-Trust Structure.label: Family-Trust Structure
Family-Trust Structure.text: Structure and operate as a family-trust style vehicle

Blockchain Token-Related.label: Blockchain Token-Related
Blockchain Token-Related.text: Issue tokens to support a blockchain ecosystem

countries.label: Countries of Activity (planned)
countries.placeholder: e.g., PA, US, EU, HK, KR ...

description.label: Key Post-Incorporation Activities & Description
description.placeholder: e.g., Hold foreign equity and receive dividends, operate online services and payment processing, allocate charitable funds, etc.

info.title: Number of Founders
info.body: A Panama PIF can be founded by one or more persons (individual or corporate). Add required members.

alreadyExists.title: Invitations sent
alreadyExists.desc: {{count}} invitation(s) sent to the email address.

none.title: No invitations sent
none.desc: Please ensure founders have valid email addresses.

individuals.title: D-1. Three Individual Council Members
individuals.note: Each member files a separate Member Registration Form. Nominee Director service is available if needed.

nominee.infoBody: Officer details are viewable at the public registry; we can list nominees if needed. Nominees do not exercise control/management nor claim ownership. UBO/significant controller verification is still required for banks/exchanges. We perform in-person/video KYC and keep records per AML laws. Fees (annual): 1 person USD 1,200, 2 persons USD 1,700, 3 persons USD 2,200 (justification recommended). Nominee shareholder: USD 1,300.

corporate.title: D-2. Council via One Corporate — Basic Info
corporate.note: Uncommon structure. Even if a corporate acts as Council, KYC of human signatory(ies) is still required.

success.title: Invitations sent
success.desc: Council members have been invited to complete their onboarding forms.

alreadyExists.title: Invitations sent
alreadyExists.desc: {{count}} invitation(s) sent to the email address.

none.title: No invitations sent
none.desc: Please ensure council members have valid email addresses.

info.body: A Protector does not run daily operations but approves/oversees major decisions.
info.examples: Examples: approval for appointment/removal of council members, approval of by-laws changes, consent to certain distribution guidelines, etc. Multiple protectors may be appointed.

alreadyExists.title: Invitations sent
alreadyExists.desc: {{count}} invitation(s) sent to the email address.

none.title: No invitations sent
none.desc: Please ensure protectors have valid email addresses.

info.designBody: ① Fixed list (named) ② By class (spouse/descendants/guardians, etc.) ③ Hybrid. For privacy/flexibility, class-based is common.
info.lowBody: A Letter of Wishes gives testamentary guidance (who/when/how much) and is relied on in practice.

letterOfWishes.label: Letter of Wishes
letterOfWishes.placeholder: (Optional) Testamentary guidance for distributions, priorities, timing, etc.

alreadyExists.title: Invitations sent
alreadyExists.desc: {{count}} invitation(s) sent to the email address.

none.title: No invitations sent
none.desc: Please ensure beneficiaries have valid email addresses.

powers.label: Allocation of Powers (Council vs Protector)
powers.placeholder: Signing authority / approval rights / removal powers, etc.

admin.label: Recordkeeping / Audit / Reporting · Dissolution Conditions
admin.placeholder: Retention periods, audit cycles, reporting lines / specific events & voting requirements, etc.

guide.title: Banks / EMIs (for reference)

list.panama: Panama local banks often require in-person interview & UBO evidence for non-resident/foundation accounts.
list.crypto: Crypto-friendly: Towerbank (subject to policies & risk appetite).
list.emi: EMI/foreign acceptance of “Foundation” varies — pre-check required.

guide.docsNote: Indicative documents: Foundation charter/registration, council register & acceptances, UBO chart, founders'/directors' passport & address proof, source of funds, business description/contracts, tax ID/residence proof, references, interview, etc.

hints.consulting: General consulting/holding: mid risk. Expect clarity on revenue/contracts/organization & UBO. Remote onboarding limited.
hints.ecommerce: Online service/e-commerce: payment flows, customer countries, refund policy required. Consider PSP/EMI alongside bank account.
hints.investment: Investment/equity holding: if largely passive, banks may be less keen. Consider brokerage/custody accounts.
hints.crypto: Virtual assets: many banks restrict. Consider crypto-friendly banks (e.g., Towerbank) or VASP/EMI combinations.
hints.manufacturing: Manufacturing/trade: require substance docs (supply agreements, shipping docs). Trade finance assessed separately.

aml.info: In line with FATF, UN, EU, OFAC, UK HMT, HKMA, etc., confirm any dealings with sanctioned countries/persons.

q1.label: Operate now / plan to operate with Iran, Sudan, South Sudan, North Korea, Syria, Cuba, Belarus, Zimbabwe, Russia, or areas in Ukraine outside government control?

q2.label: Any related persons reside in those countries or in a country sanctioned by UN, EU, UK HMT, HKMA, or OFAC (or Ukrainian areas outside government control)?

q3.label: Is / will the PIF be owned, controlled, or acting for sanctioned persons/entities or persons in Afghanistan, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Russia, Syria, or Ukrainian areas outside government control?

q4.label: Any related persons currently operate or plan to operate in Crimea or Sevastopol?

q5.label: Do the PIF/holding/group/affiliates operate now or plan to operate in oil, gas, energy, military, or defense sectors (including critical goods)?
q5.examples: Examples: explosives, lubricants, sensors, micro-electronics, communications modules, passive components, navigation, electrical parts, PCB production/QC tools, CNC machines/parts.

publicDeed.title: Public Deed
publicDeed.desc: Notarized deed for formation; includes purpose, council, registered agent, etc.

registryCert.title: Certificate of Public Registry
registryCert.desc: Certificate issued by the Public Registry (legal existence).

councilRegister.title: Register of Council Members
councilRegister.desc: List of council members (3 individuals / 1 corporate).

bylaws.title: Regulations (By-Laws)
bylaws.desc: Private internal regulations: powers, procedures, distribution, records, dissolution, etc.

right.title: Original Shipping Details
right.note: (If the address is written in a language other than English, please also provide it in the local language.)

accounting.info: Regulations require disclosing the address where accounting records are stored. You may provide an office or residential address. If you use our address, USD 350 per year applies; records must be provided to us periodically.

entity.label: Mirr Asia setup fee + first-year services

tooltip.title: Setup package (all-in)
tooltip.body: Includes government fees (corporation USD 300 / PIF separate), Resident Agent, and Registered Office.

reason.label: Reason for selecting 3 nominee directors (setup)
reason.placeholder: Please state why 3 nominee directors are needed.
reason.hint: * We recommend providing a reason when selecting 3.

includes.title: Setup package includes (PIF):

items.i3: Notarization and registration of the charter

includes.note: Note: Accounting fees are not included; bookkeeping/audit/tax filings are quoted separately.

processing.title: Payment is processing
processing.msg: Your payment is processing. You’ll receive a receipt once the transaction is confirmed.

errors.confirmGeneric: Something went wrong while confirming payment.
errors.backendReceiptMissing: Payment confirmed, but we couldn’t retrieve the receipt from the server. Please contact support if you didn’t receive an email.
errors.backendSaveFailed: Payment confirmed, but saving the payment on the server failed. We’ll email your receipt soon or contact support.
errors.statusPrefix: Payment status: {{status}}. If this persists, contact support.

alerts.expiredGuard: This quote expired. Please refresh or contact us.
alerts.cardInitError: Could not initialize card payment. Please try again.

checks.taxOk: I confirm compliance with applicable tax obligations and that the PIF is not intended for unlawful/sanctioned purposes.
checks.truthOk: I confirm the accuracy and completeness of the information provided.
checks.privacyOk: I consent to the processing of personal data for KYC/sanctions screening and service delivery.

declarations.footnote: ※ This form is for preliminary information gathering for review/quotation/KYC and does not constitute legal or tax advice.

1.s: Our compliance officer will review your KYC/CDD and shareholding information. ETA: 1–2 business days.

2.s: We will file the incorporation documents.

3.s: Expected: Certificate of Incorporation & Business Registration within 3-4 business weeks.

4.s: If selected, we arrange an account opening with your preferred bank/EMI.

header.title: Panama Private Interest Foundation – Member Registration Form
header.intro: This form collects required information for the individual registration of PIF participants (Founder, Council, Protector, Beneficiary, etc.). Individuals use this form; a separate form applies to corporates.
header.note: ※ This is baseline information for KYC/AML and regulatory compliance. Please complete all required fields accurately.

fetch.errorDesc: An unexpected error occurred while fetching data.

email.label: Email Address (use the same email where you receieved invite)

renamed.label: Name Change (ever changed your legal name?)
renamed.hint: If yes, please add your former English full name in the remarks below.

isFounder.label: Are you a Founder of the PIF to be established?

contribution.label: (If Founder) Contribution Amount (USD)
contribution.note: ※ In Panamanian practice it is shown as “Initial Endowment”. Lawful minimum USD 10,000 (no mandatory funding required).

sof.label: Source of Funds for Contribution (select all that apply)
sof.otherPlaceholder: Please specify the other source of funds

chips.invest: Investment Income||Real estate, equities, bonds, funds
chips.disposal: Business/Share Disposal||Proceeds from sale of business or shares
chips.bizdiv: Business Income / Dividends||Operating profits, dividend income

tax.title: 3) Tax Information
tax.note: ※ “Tax residence” generally refers to the jurisdiction where you spend ≥183 days/year or are otherwise liable to income tax.

roles.title: 4) Role(s) in the Foundation (select all that apply)
roles.note:
Protector: may hold oversight/approval rights (e.g., appointment/removal of council, by-laws amendments).
Beneficiary: receives economic benefits. For privacy, beneficiary details can be structured via By-Laws / Letter of Wishes.

futureFunds.title: 5) Future Funds Inflow/Generation to the PIF

pep.title: 6) Politically Exposed Person (PEP) Check
pep.note: PEP: includes current/former senior public officials, senior political party officials, SOE executives, and senior officials of international organizations, as well as their family members and close associates (per FATF guidance).
pep.detailPlaceholder: Full name / position / relationship / period, etc.

docs.title: 7) Required Documents Checklist
docs.note: All documents should be issued within the last 3 months. Non-English documents may require certified translation. Certified passport copies can be obtained from local authorities.

items.doc_passport: Passport copy + Certificate of Passport Copy (notarized/certified)
items.doc_bank: Bank statement(s) for the last 12 months or a Bank Reference Letter
items.doc_address: Proof of address (e.g., resident register extract / utility bill)

bo.title: 8) Beneficial Owner (BO) Confirmation
bo.note: Summary Definition: the natural person(s) who ultimately owns or controls the legal arrangement (FATF/OECD).

decls.title: 9) Declarations & Consents
decls.textHtml:
I hereby confirm and agree to the following:

① The funds stated herein are owned by me and I have full authority to transfer them to the PIF.
② The assets, net worth, income, or activities of the PIF are not connected to illicit weapons/WMD, money laundering, illegal narcotics, or any activity deemed unlawful.
③ I have obtained, or had access to, appropriate legal and/or tax advice prior to this application.
④ I acknowledge the obligation to pay annual fees and consent to electronic communications for notices and confirmations.
decls.agree: I have read and agree to all of the above.

companyName.question: Name of the Company applying for establishment

corporationRelationship.question: Relationship with the corporation you are establishing (select all that apply)
corporationRelationship.info: [Description of Designated Contact Person] You must designate a designated contact person to be in charge of the company's business contact. The designated contact person will be in charge of major business contact with our company, and their duties include contacting you regarding company and business-related inquiries, checking progress, and registered documents. The designated contact person can view your company's information and documents, and can also view your company's mail. Designating one contact person is free of charge, and for two or more, an annual fee of USD 250 will be charged per person. The delegated designated contact person will be designated by your company and registered separately with our company, thereby protecting your company's information and reducing confusion in business. (The delegated designated contact person must provide a scanned copy of the front and back of their ID.) **Note: If the designated contact person changes, you must immediately contact us to update this information, fill out this form individually, and submit the required documents.

ubo.label: UBO (Ultimate Beneficiary Owner)
ubo.description: Refers to a beneficial owner who directly or indirectly owns 25% or more of the shares.

options.shareholderProxy: Shareholder's proxy (trustee acting on behalf of shareholder)
options.designatedContact: Designated contact person (a representative who will communicate with us on behalf of the new company)

taxCountry.question: Taxing country
taxCountry.info: A taxing country is a country in which you currently reside for more than 183 days per year or a country in which you pay taxes on your personal income (salary/rental income, etc.).

taxNumber.question: Taxpayer Number
taxNumber.info: The Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is also called the Tax Identification Number (TIN) and is usually listed on your tax payment receipt. If you live in Korea and pay taxes in Korea but do not know your taxpayer identification number, you can enter your Resident Registration Number.

annualSaleIncomePrevYr.question: Please select your approximate annual sales and income (in USD) for the previous year.
annualSaleIncomePrevYr.validation: Please select at least one option

currentNetWorth.question: Please select your approximate current net worth (in USD)
currentNetWorth.validation: Please select at least one option

isPoliticallyProminentFig.question: Are you a politically prominent figure who fits the description above, or do you have an immediate family member or close acquaintance who holds a high-ranking public office, is a politician, government official, military or international organization official, or is a politically prominent figure?
isPoliticallyProminentFig.info: Politically Exposed Person (Source: FATF Guidance: Politically Exposed Persons (Rec 12 and 22)) 1. A foreign politically exposed person means a person who currently or has had political or social influence in a foreign country. For example, a senior official in the executive, judicial, defense, or other government agencies of a foreign government, a senior official in a major foreign political party, or a manager in a foreign state-owned enterprise. 2. A domestic politically exposed person means a person who currently or has had political or social influence in a domestic country. (For example, a senior official in the executive, judicial, defense, or other government agencies of a domestic government, a senior official in a major domestic political party, or a manager in a foreign state-owned enterprise.) 3. A politically exposed person of an international organization means a person who has influence in an international organization, for example, a director, officer, member of the board of directors, senior management, or a person with equivalent authority. 4. A politically exposed person in a family relationship means a parent, sibling, spouse, child, or relative by blood or marriage. 5. A close politically important person refers to a person who has a close social or business relationship with a politically important person.

descPoliticImpRel.question: Please describe in detail whether you are a politically important figure or your relationship with such a person.

passportId.question: Please upload a copy of your passport and a passport copy certificate (issued by the district office).
passportId.info: You can apply for a passport copy certificate at your local district office. The document title is Certificate of Passport Copy.
passportId.validation: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, PDF)

bankStatement3Mnth.question: Please upload a copy of your most recent 3-month bank statement or Bank Reference Letter that shows your name and address. (If the document is not in English, it must be translated and notarized, and additional translation and notarization fees will apply.)
bankStatement3Mnth.info: This is a required document for incorporation. Without this document, the establishment of a Panamanian corporation cannot proceed.
bankStatement3Mnth.validation: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, PDF)

addressProof.question: Please upload a copy of your address proof document (English copy)
addressProof.info: Please obtain it at a nearby community center, an unmanned issuance machine, or online and submit it.
addressProof.validation: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, PDF)

profRefLetter.question: Please upload a professional reference letter (can be provided by a lawyer, accountant, paralegal, tax accountant, banker, asset manager, business partner, employer, etc.) with whom you have been in business for at least 2 years.
profRefLetter.info: This is a required document for incorporation. Without this document, the incorporation of a Panama corporation cannot proceed. * It must be issued within 3 months of the date of issue.
profRefLetter.placeholder: Choose professional reference letter image file
profRefLetter.validation: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, PDF)

engResume.question: Please upload your English resume.
engResume.validation: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, PDF)

isCrimeConvitted.question: Have you ever been arrested or convicted of a crime against the law?

lawEnforced.question: Have you ever been investigated by law enforcement agencies (police, prosecutors) or tax authorities?

isMoneyLaundered.question: Are you involved in any criminal, money laundering, bribery or terrorist activity with respect to your business or personal funds, or are you involved in any other illegal activity involving funds derived from such activities?

isBankRupted.question: Have you ever been personally involved in a bankruptcy or liquidation?

isInvolvedBankRuptedOfficer.question: Have you ever been involved in a bankruptcy or liquidation as an officer of a company?

isPartnerOfOtherComp.question: Are you a director / shareholder / beneficial owner (UBO) / associate / partner of another company or an associate of another organization or association?
isPartnerOfOtherComp.info: If applicable, please list your company name, country of location, and job title in the following sections.

otherPartnerOtherComp.question: If you selected 'Yes' to previous section, please provide specific details.

declarationAgreement.question: To the best of my knowledge, the assets, net worth, income or activities of the Foundation are not in any way connected with illegal weapons, money laundering, illegal narcotics or other illegal controlled substances or any activity that I know to be illegal in my country of citizenship, residence and/or incorporation.I do not intend to obstruct, delay or defraud my creditors or to do anything illegal with respect to creditors or any other party, and I do not intend to use the services of the Corporate Service Provider to facilitate or otherwise engage in any such activity.I agree to provide the necessary documentation and information in connection with this Service and that such information may be provided to agencies, authorities and companies necessary to provide the Service.I fully release the Corporate Service Provider and any of its associates from any and all liability of any kind whatsoever arising from reliance on any fact or statement contained in this Declaration that may later be found to be untrue or materially inaccurate.Do you have read and agree to the above?

companyRelation.question: Relationship with Singapore Company to be established
companyRelation.info: You must designate a designated contact person to be in charge of the company's business contacts. The designated contact person will be in charge of major business contacts with our company, and their duties include contacting you regarding company and business-related inquiries, checking progress, and contacting you regarding registered documents, etc. The designated contact person can access your company's information and documents, and can also access your mail. Designating one contact person is free of charge, and for two or more, an annual fee of USD 250 will be charged per person. The designated contact person is designated by your company and registered separately with our company to protect your company's information and reduce confusion in business. (The designated contact person must submit a copy of their passport, proof of address, and go through the identity verification process in the same way as shareholders/executives.) **Note: If there is a change in the designated contact person, you must immediately contact us to update it, and fill out this form individually and submit the required documents.

isPoliticallyProminentFig.question: Are you a politically exposed person in the above description, or are your immediate family members or close acquaintances a major politically exposed person, such as a high-ranking official, political, government official, military or international organization official?
isPoliticallyProminentFig.info: FATF Guidance: Politically Exposed Persons (Rec 12 and 22):    1. Foreign politically exposed persons are those who have political/social influence in foreign countries at present or in the past. For example, it means a high-ranking administrator of a foreign government, judicial, national defense, or other government agency, a high-ranking administrator of a major foreign political party, or a manager in a foreign state-owned enterprise.2. Domestic politically exposed persons are those who have political/social influence in the country at present or in the past. For example, a high-ranking administrator of a domestic government, judicial, national defense, or other government agency, a high-ranking administrator of a major domestic political party, or a manager of a foreign state-owned enterprise.3. A politically exposed person  in an international organization means a person who influences an international organization, for example, a director, a clerk or a member of the board of directors, senior management, or a person with equal authority.4. Politically exposed persons in a family relationship refer to parents, siblings, spouses, children, relatives by blood or marriage.5. A person who is closely related to a political person means a person who is socially or professionally related to a political person.

descPoliticImpRel.question: Please describe in detail whether you are a politically important figure or your relationship with such a person.

passportId.question: Please upload a copy of your passport and a passport copy certificate (issued by the district office).
passportId.info: You can apply for a passport copy certificate at your local district office. The document title is Certificate of Passport Copy.
passportId.validation: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, PDF)

addressProof.question: Please upload a copy of your address proof document (English copy)
addressProof.info: Please obtain it at a nearby community center, an unmanned issuance machine, or online and submit it.

isMoneyLaundered.question: Are you involved in any criminal, money laundering, bribery or terrorist activity with respect to your business or personal funds, or are you involved in any other illegal activity involving funds derived from such activities?

isBankRupted.question: Have you ever been personally involved in a bankruptcy or liquidation?

isInvolvedBankRuptedOfficer.question: Have you ever been involved in a bankruptcy or liquidation as an officer of a company?

describeIfInvolvedBankRupted.question: If you have selected 'Yes' in the Declaration section, please state the specifics about it.

declarationAgreement.question: You agree to provide documents and information for our business in relation to this service, and in relation to this service, you agree that the purpose of establishing and operating the company is just and for legitimate business. After incorporation, the Company is not obligated to provide help or advice on matters that violate the law, and the Company reserves the right to discontinue the service if it is determined that there is an intention to violate the law or related matters. You hereby declare that everything written on this application is true, complete and accurate to the best of your knowledge. Do you agree?

companyRelation.question: Relationship with Singapore Company to be established
companyRelation.info: You should choose the relationship with the Singapore company to be established. You must delegate a person('Designated contact person') who will be in charge of contacting in relation to your company's business, incorporation and renewal of your company, registration of documents, confirmations of the required information, and communications for various matters in respect of our services. Appointment of the designated contact person is free for up to 1 person, and if you would like to delegate 2 or more designated contact persons, an annual fee of USD250 per person will be charged. The designated contact person will be delegated by your company and should be registered separately with us to protect your company's information, reduce business confusion, and prevent identity fraud. (The Designated Contact Person must provide a scanned copy of the front and back of the ID.)
